crisishelp:
911 is the national emergency number in the United States.

http://suicidepreventionlifeline.org/
> 1-800-273-8255
> 1-888-628-9454 (ESP)
> 1-800-799-4889 (Deaf & Hard of Hearing Options)

https://www.veteranscrisisline.net/
> 1-800-273-8255

www.imalive.org

http://crisistextline.org
> Text HOME to 741-741.

http://www.samaritansusa.org/

The Trevor Project, for lesbian, gay, bisexual, transgender and questioning youth.
> 1-866-488-7386.
> https://www.thetrevorproject.org/get-help-now/ (available 7 days a week from 3PM to 10PM ET)
> Text TREVOR to 1-202-304-1200 (available M-F from 3PM to 10PM ET).

https://www.translifeline.org/
> 1-877-565-8860

PLEASE MENTION THE ROLE @Crisis Help IF YOU NEED MORE HELP.
